segments.text: Have the owners come up with a counter-offer to my offer to buy their home yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The owners have counter-offered three hundred and thirty-five thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are two ways to respond . You can either come back with another offer or go with their counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if I make another offer , and they don â€™ t accept it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No one else has made an offer , so you could make another offer if you want to do so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that I would like to offer three hundred and thirty thousand dollars as a counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I will present your counter-offer to the owners tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long before I find out what their decision is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By now , the owners probably have a pretty good idea of what they will accept . It will go quickly .
segments.speaker: S2
